title: Realme unveils the new Realme Book Prime and Realme Buds Air 3 at MWC 2022
content:
Alongside the highly-anticipated Realme GT 2 series, Realme has unveiled the Realme Book Prime and the Reame Buds Air 3 at the ongoing MWC 2022 trade show. We’ve already taken a look at the new flagship smartphones from the company in a separate post, and in this post, we’ll share details about the new Windows

The post Realme unveils the new Realme Book Prime and Realme Buds Air 3 at MWC 2022 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Alongside the new Realme GT 2 series, Realme has unveiled the Realme Book Prime and Realme Buds Air 3 at MWC 2022. Read on to learn more.
